title: Love Island's Molly-Mae Hague and Tommy Fury lean in for a kiss as they pose with pumpkins
text:
Get the biggest Daily Love Island stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Molly-Mae Hague and Tommy Fury 's love has gone from strength to strength.

And the social media guru kept their fans in the loop with the couple's dates when she shared a snap from their pumpkin patch outing on Saturday.

In the picture, Tommy leaned in for a kiss with his love Molly-Mae looking up at him lovingly.

The boxer draped his arm over her shoulder and the influencer entwined her fingers with his as they held hands.

Love Island winner Amber Gill also pointed out the pair were donning matching Louis Vuitton belt bags for their day out.

(Image: Instagram)

Both Tommy and Molly-Mae juggled a pumpkin in their free hand.

Pumpkins were lined up in a series of rows behind the couple as they posed for their picture-perfect Instagram snap.

"Couple of pumpkins," she wrote in the caption of the post.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Also Tommy took to social media to show off the light-hearted side of their day.

The Love Island hunk led out on a number of pumpkins while his love snapped the fun picture.

They have stepped up their romance as they have made a home in Manchester their lovenest.

The duo were the longest-standing couple in Love Island and narrowly missed out on the £50K prize fund.

Yet they walked away with a romance that appears to be made to last.

Molly-Mae has even got Tommy filming with her for her vlogs when she isn't busy working on her latest fashion shoot or collaboration.
description: They have already been getting in the Halloween spirit as Molly-Mae transformed into a zombie tomb raider
